website_summaries.verdict: Made in the US from 100% natural ingredients, including coral reef safe mineral SPF 12.
pros: Light green tint plus cooling lavender and cucumber helps combat redness
Matte finish is perfect under makeup and the scent is fresh
A high-end product at a good price, plus customers also love the company's ethic
cons: The pump had both fans and detractors – some found the cream too thick to pump easily

customer_reviews.title: A big selling point for me is the green color because I have some mild redness on my face and this calms it nicely. My skin always feels soft and healthy after ...
customer_reviews.text: I first got a sample of this moisturizer in an ipsy bag and was excited from the description. I much prefer products that are more natural and clearly this item fits that bill. A big selling point for me is the green color because I have some mild redness on my face and this calms it nicely. My skin always feels soft and healthy after applying and a little goes a long way. I'd also like to note that I also received samples for other products by Jivi as well as a very kind hand written note with it. Very pleasing transaction all around and would certainly recommend anyone give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Arro

customer_reviews.title: Super fun company/awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: 1) This company is amazing! Their packaging is so cute and they include handwritten cards and thank you notes with every order. There was even an adorable business card w the expiration date on it! 2) The product is excellent. This is exactly what I’ve been looking for in a daily moisturizer— smells great, color correcting, spf, non pore clogging, packed with skin food, and all organic!! The super sanitary pump was the cherry on top. Totally hooked. Thanks y’all!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: I loved it so much
customer_reviews.text: Ipsy provided a sample of this moisturizer in my May bag. I loved it so much , I need a full size. Great smell , great consistency , love the green tint which really helps witn my redness. I don’t leave the house without it
customer_reviews.author: Miguel-Jose Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Seriously high end product without a ridiculous price tag- I love Jivi!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this moisturizer feels on my skin. The scent is so clean and refreshing that it balances well with any facial cleanser you use beforehand. I have also found that the green tone helps to reduce redness on my face before i apply make up. The mission of this company is fantastic, I will definitely be purchasing other products.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: #1-It’s green. Yuck! #2-Too much fragrance and oily feel to be for sensitive skin. #3-When applies to my sensitive skin, it set it on fire. Again, not for sensitive skin. I have used Guinot Hydrasensitive skin for years and was trying to try a cheaper alternative. Well, I will not do that again. Ordered it as soon as I got this stuff off my face. Thanks but no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for my ultra fair/red sensitive skin. I absolutly love it. I saw instant results the first time I used it and see an overall difference in the redness even when I dont put it on. I have dry sensitive skin and it is very hard to find a balance between moisture and something that wont make me break out. Has a mild scent of lavender that I find pleasant. Love the silly packaging. Great company with a mission and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I had very high hopes for this product, as i've been searching high and low for a product to diminish some of the redness in my skin. Thanks to my rosacea, i have very red, sensitive skin, and this product did nothing to help with any of those things. First off, the smell is horrible. I'm not a fan of the texture, it's very tacky and dries quick which might work nicely for someone with oily skin but was not enough for my thirsty face. After about a week of using this product, my rosacea was even worse. I really only like the packaging. The pump is convenient and the bottle is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Avobenzone free, skin soothing
customer_reviews.text: Originally got this for my teenage daughters so they would have a non greasy moisturizer with some SPF. The ingredients seem much more natural than many out there, and it’s tough to find an SPF moisturizer without avobenzone. I tried it out of curiosity because of the green tint to see if it really does have redness canceling ability. Now we all can’t live without it. We have seen some cumulative skin improvement and clarity. It’s non greasy but just moisturizing enough for us, and really does seem to be skin soothing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: This stuff just isn't for me. It feels like it takes a lot of product to cover my face and feel fully moisturized. I appreciate that it has spf in it as well as all good for you ingredients, I'm finding this combo is difficult to find at this price point. The smell is ok, not my favorite though and it doesnt really leave my skin feeling great. All in all the hunt is still in for me to,fund the right moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this review because I love it. My skin feels and looks better. It’s got a serious glow now. Not greasy. It’s actually, my skin, glowing. I don’t use my highlighting makeup anymore. Never thought I’d say any of this about a lotion. Two things, you cannot see if you are running low, and the “call your mother”— while cute, this could really piss someone off or make someone really sad. As a marketing professional, I’d leave the mother part out.
customer_reviews.author: ZJ

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT! YOU WILL TOO!😍
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this face cream in a make up bag about two months ago. Normally I am very picky about creams but this just blew me away! Light scent, non oily, tinted pale green to minimize my ruddy complexion. Perfect! I had to buy it in full size. A little goes a long way! I'm hooked. It's a great bargain! Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth your buck!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review this after using it for a few months and wow! This is great. I have sensitive, acne prone skin and have not been able to find a good moisturizer until now. This has worked wonderfully and I love love love that there's SPF in it since I live in FL currently. I am not sure why people complain about the smell in the reviews it just smells like expensive skincare you'd get at a spa and it's not very pungent at all. Not to mention the packaging is so modern and cute! I definitely recommend this. I even prefer it over my $70 Tatcha Water Cream!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Packaging leaves a bit to be desired; product Good
customer_reviews.text: Not greasy, but leaves me not thinking about my face all day. That makes me think it is doing its job. The lavender fragrance was a bit off putting when I first began using it, but now I’ve stop noticing it before I finish applying it. The pump applicator is a bit of a pain, but there is always the chance they will improve it. There is no way to tell how much is left. That really needs to be addressed.
customer_reviews.author: History Buff

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this while looking for a cruelty free moisturizer, and love the natural ingredients and made in US. The scent is strong, but I love lavender and I got used to it. It did not turn my skin green. It was a little too thick which I managed by mixing it with a previously bought moisturizer that was too thin. I would like to buy it again...but I live in the valley of the sun, and need more SPF. Off only it had SPF30, It would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wow I really like this! It’s a little bit scary out of the bottle because it’s green, but it goes on easily and absorbs quickly. Just a hint of nice fragrance that doesn’t linger. I don’t have to wait to apply makeup. Really perfect . Not sticky or greasy. The green color just disappears.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this facial moisturizer. It smells nice, and is super lightweight and not at all greasy. I have sensitive skin and this product works well in my simple routine. 5/5 in ever category except sun protection because it is only spf 15. I usually wait for this to soak into my skin then spritz my face with neutrogena facial sunscreen spray with spf 45 for wrinkle prevention. Regardless, bravo for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Barrows

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer without greasiness!
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer! I always have trouble finding a good moisturizer that I can wear alone that won’t make my face oily (especially one with spf). But even though this formula is rather thick, it doesn’t leave my face greasy looking or feeling at all. Once it soaks in its nice and matte and it also eliminates any redness. This is my new go-to moisturizer from now on. It’s great alone and under makeup. Would definitely recommend, plus I feel like the bottle will last a while cause you really don’t need that much per application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer! It leaves my skin feeling so good and is a great base for makeup. The green tint is also a nice bonus to neutralize redness. Also, I have used this everyday for the last 6 months and the bottle still has lots left. I will definitely be ordering it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm Amazed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very into skincare and am always researching and trying new products. I use expensive esthetician products and have sensitive but oily skin. I received this in an Ipsy box and enjoyed it enough to buy the full size. I put it away and didn't use it for a couple months because I forgot about it, but was in need of a face moisturizer so pulled it out. I am SO impressed with its performance...its light, makes me skin even toned and smooth and moisturizes just enough. I really like that it has some SPF in it, as well. I am now rethinking all my expensive products because this really blew me away! Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Merry N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and funny
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because of my Ipsy bag. I love it so much. The smell is amazing and my skin feels so much better after using it. Also the bag it came in gave me a good laugh. This company definitely care about its customers. I would highly recommend this product if not this whole company to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and ordered this specifically because it's all natural. But I still broke out in dermatitis all over my face and neck after a couple of uses. If you have sensitive skin, I would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Carroll-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but really enjoy
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy so many aspects of this moisturizer. From the scent, to the moisturizing power, to the slightly color-correcting... The only thing I wasn't crazy about is that it hasn't helped my oily situation at all. Because it does make me a little more oily than normal, I have had some more break outs. However, the parts of it that I like are enough for me to most likely re-buy this once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lizard

customer_reviews.title: High quality, but not your foundation’s friend
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is very gentle on my extremely sensitive skin, and the green tint helps diminish the redness of my rosacea. However, I bought this hoping to use it under makeup, and was disappointed to find that it balled up after application, regardless of how little was on my skin. I will still use it because it works so well with my skin, and it will be helpful for days I don’t wear makeup. So for people looking to wear this alone- either at nighttime or without makeup during the day, I highly recommend this, especially if you have sensitive skin. But if you’re looking for a green-tinted moisturizer to apply before makeup, this isn’t for you.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Thurlow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It’s a little weird at first that it’s green, but it actually combats redness before applying makeup which is great. No white cast is also great. I wear it daily. Doesn’t feel sticky or like I even need another moisturizer. I live in the Southwest too. Haven’t burned all year!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Plant based complexion clearing awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I got it in my Ipsy glam bag as a sample and recently would try anything to relieve my adult acne I’ve never had till now. I busted this out and gave it a try one night and the next day my big zits we’re almost completely gone. It’s a weird kind of matte texture and it’s green but goes on clear. It’s so awesome! Makes my skin clear and soft and all natural which I love! I’d highly recommend if you’re looking for a natural plant based face lotion. I used to use bare minerals face wash products but now, I’ve replaced that lotion with this and love it. Affordable too!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I love this lotion!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is wonderful. I have been looking for a suitable lotion for my face for years and this is finally it. It does not leave my skin feeling oily but definitely moisturized and lasts all day. Additionally, I often get red or blotchy skin in the morning and this cream is soothing and makes me look refreshed and awake after I use it. It also smells great...like a lavender aromatherapy session every morning. It is calming and I love it. And finally, as if the lotion weren't enough, they give a donation with every purchase so I actually like buying from them and I feel like I am helping someone else while helping myself. I highly recommend this lotion!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hussey

customer_reviews.title: Your Skin’s New Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the lavender moisturizer for about a year now (Thanks to Ipsy for introducing me). It’s honestly the best moisturizer I’ve used in years & you don’t need a lot either. I have dry skin and this has really helped neutralize some of that dryness. Amazing smell for an amazing product My only complaint - As a Canadian it’s a slightly harder find.
customer_reviews.author: Scoop

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best moisturizer I’ve ever used. Ipsy brought me here, after using the sample I had to get another, it’s light, breathable and it works so well, my skin is softer, smoother and even. The fact that this product donates to a good cause and Is cruelty free is awesome. I also enjoyed the humor the package came with, will always purchase again. Try it !
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love that my skin can breath when I use this. Most sun protection lotions I've used have made my pore feel greasy or clogged after application. I've read other reviews of the product line about a fun y smell, but I didn't experience that at all. I could smell the ingredients and I personally liked it. I normally go with unscented products but this smells and made me feel fresh in the mornings :)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this moisturizer, doesn't break me out, and excellent for sensitive skin, I don't regret buying this product, which I regret not having bought sooner. Measure to use a sun hat if you want extra protection for your skin!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Suqui

customer_reviews.title: Natural sun blocker
customer_reviews.text: Love this facial sun block. It is a little on the dry side so I mix it w/another moisturizer. Very light fragrance, does not irritate sensitive skin. Uses zinc oxide to protect. Lasts all day. Have bought several time now. Only wish it had a higher SPF. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fay_way

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I have been searching for something to hydrate and soothe my skin And not make me break out. I’m 32 and have the pimple prone skin of an angry teenager. This miraculous green goodness not only moisturized my skin, but it made it chill the heck out and in 3 days ALL of my pimples were almost gone. Skin is glowing and I can’t even believe it. I have been searching for this my whole life and now I’m sold. Thank you thank you thank you!! I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Sun protection without chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This power packed Sunscreen 🧴 is soooo hydrating. I love ❤️ the green color Perfector. The Lavender is such a relaxing 😌 smell It comes out thick, and you don’t need much to cover your face, neck and décolleté. It rocks 🤎🤎
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Wow it’s different! And amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This is completely different from lotion or other moisturizers. I love that it is organic and has only important ingredients in it, no water. It seems to calm my redness which is is great. The morning after my first time using it at night I woke up and my face felt like actual skin on the rest of my body. Perfectly hydrated and not greasy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and the feel of this moisturizer. It really does take away a bit of redness on my cheeks. My only complaint is that I wish it came in a bigger size... but it's a good price for what it is! Feels like a higher-end product.
customer_reviews.author: amandamay24

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I consider it a perfect moisturizer for the winter time. It’s very smooth, on the heavy side, which is perfect for the winter, moisturizes skin really good, sometimes I’m mixing it up with my oils. I got the cucumber one, it smells very good! Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Officially a for-life customer!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best moisturizer out there. As someone who has struggled with chronically dry skin my whole life, this product is the best thing I've stumbled across. The reason I believe this to be true is because I've never used a product that actually does all three of these things. 1) moisturizes (like, actually) 2) doesn't burn 3) leaves your skin feeling clean The formula is pristine. It doesn't burn at all, it soothes beyond all belief. And it leaves my skin feeling refresh. 10/10. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth
customer_reviews.text: I needed a moisturizer with sunblock and this was a winner after much research. I wanted something with healthy ingredients and this was it. No also wanted something that would not be cakey and leave a white residue. This is a great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mineral moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have used both the cucumber sage and lavender scents. I generally don't wear make up and any chemical creams, but wearing just this moisturizer gives me a glowing matte effect on my skin because of the green shade. It doesn't give u a chalk effect though it has zinc oxide in it. Personally I felt Lavender scent is moisturizing well compared to cucumber sage. Like everyone else said, I wished this had a higher SPF.
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Honest company
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the product, (just wish the SPF was a little higher but that's fine) and the company. I love that they donate a meal to charity for every purchase and I love what they stand for, please never stop making your awesome products!
customer_reviews.author: CommanderDonut

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I was looking for a facial cream with spf and wanted something all natural. This cream seems to get the job done. No facial irritation yet, and I have somewhat dry skin. A little bit of this goes a long way too which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jill4115

customer_reviews.title: GREAT price and its 100% natural
customer_reviews.text: I have cystic acne/ REALLY oily skin and this is the only moisturizer that I’ve came across that actually calms my acne (to where my pimples actually go away and acne scars are lightened) and moisturizes it without making my skin oily. It actually makes my skin less oily and makes my makeup look flawless. GREAT price and its 100% natural. I will be buying more from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: This is more for oily skin but I don’t believe that has enough SPF in it
customer_reviews.text: This product wasn’t very moisturizing .Of course I’m 49 although my skin is pretty decent and just lacks a lot of moisture. I now use Whipped coconut butter. I normally use this at night it does not clog my pores which is a blessing. And I don’t feel I got any effects of sunscreen from the product
customer_reviews.author: Reem

customer_reviews.title: Miracle skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin hates everything. No matter what I try, a patchy, itchy, red, flakey mess awaits. UNTIL NOW! From day one I noticed a dramatic improvement. My skin feels soft, smooth, and hydrated. My t zone isn't oily, my cheeks aren't dry. Sinks in super fast and doesn't leave a sticky residue. Scent is light and I only notice it for about a minute. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patti R. Azzara

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your face hydrated, but not oily.
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest I tried this product when I got it in my ispy bag. I looked everywhere on ispy to purchase a full size and finally I found it!!!!.....but on Amazon. This product is now my fav moisturizer. I have to be careful about what I put on my face because I have psoriasis and this one leaves my face feeling hydrated, but not oily and smells nice too. My skin is highly sensitive to SPF and I have no problem. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new face lotion when my other became discontinued. I was reading up on the all natural ingredients, loved it, so I ordered. The box it came is really cute, and contains little snippets of info on the company, one being they donate to Feeding America. So hard to find an all natural moisturizer with sunscreen. The cucumber sage scent is really nice. Thanks for the the wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer, absorbs well. I took a star off because of the smell is kind of odd, it’s like a hint of lavender but not really a lavender smell, it doesn’t linger but still isn’t the best when rubbing it on.
customer_reviews.author: jlynn1986

customer_reviews.title: It’s the best moisturizer in so many ways!
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer makes me excited to wake up in the morning. I’m not even kidding. I look forward to my skin routine now. The lavender relaxes my mind and soothes my skin at the same time . Its given me confidence to go bare face just about everywhere. (Which I wouldn’t get caught dead before) I can’t say enough nice things about this product and the company, I’m very very happy with my purchase. OH AND every purchase provides a meal to the hungry. Thankyou for being perfect. I appreciate you.
customer_reviews.author: Dos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: 1) Love the size of the product (1.7 oz) for the price 2) Super moisturizing and smells super herby ( if you like that) 3) Adorable packaging and great delivery 4) Visible results in just a few days
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I break out whenever I wear make up or any type of more stories in cream and I have not had one break out since I've started using it. I've moved to Houston And I need the extra protection that this provides
customer_reviews.author: Tablet

customer_reviews.title: Does not feel like a moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product and support this company. However by calling it a moisturizer is miss-leading for me. It does not feel like a moisturizer, I find it Leaves my face chalky/dry when applied. I have not noticed what the sun protection is like, I didn’t see any difference. I’ll update my review if I do. I also found the pump difficult to use
customer_reviews.author: A po

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about a year. I love it. Smells great and keeps face freash. I was having a rash on my face and did research, I found this product online. After using a week my face healed and I've never had a problem again !
customer_reviews.author: Jo Leopard

customer_reviews.title: This product worked wonders for my dry sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of the lavender face moisturizer in an ipsy bag and I was amazed with the results. I have had dry patchy skin for as long as I can remember and also suffer from extremely sensitive skin. This product has been a wonder for me! No more patches and my skin is overall better looking. I decided to purchase the full size moisturizer as well as the Eucaliptus mint face wash and I have not been disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Bailee Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Not good under makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible under make up, as soon as I applied my primer the sunscreen started to pill. I am sure alone it is fine but I wear makeup every day and was hoping it would give me some added sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Kershaw

customer_reviews.title: It's  not oily
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I had received a sample of this moisturizer and I was so impressed that I bought the larger size. It's very hydrating and does not leave the skin oily. I also have not seen any issues with acne due to clogged pores.
customer_reviews.author: David S Foster

customer_reviews.title: Green fades away
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but wish it had a little more moisture to it but not water, but maybe Vit E or another oil. I find one or two pumps will cover my face and neck, but it dries out quickly putting it on. Cucumber scent fades as it dries. Face does feel moisturized and protected throughout the day. No sunburns so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree McKay

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for something like this!
customer_reviews.text: This is currently the only facial moisturizer I use - it leave my very sensitive skin feeling hydrated but not oily. I am on my second bottle and I can see buying many more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Get your life Hunty!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I used to not like to wear any moisturizer because of how they made my skin feel, oily and smothered. Upon first application my initial reaction was OH NO THIS WILL NOT DO! I was repulsed by the thick consistency and how it felt when I first applied it however, after a minute it soaked into my skin and it felt great! I have already noticed a difference in my skin after two weeks. I am hooked on it. I’m glad I bought two bottles to start with lol I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Natural & skin safe moisturizer that works !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fully natural moisturizer that works and help with acne prone skin. Thank you ! Love the cucumber & sage smell and just ordered a lavender one. Goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on your skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff feels really good on your face. This is like made by hand. It is a nice product that you won’t find from like a big retailer. Love the packaging. Smells natural like cucumber.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Double

customer_reviews.title: Been buying for years
customer_reviews.text: Great for redness & problematic-oily skin. Faster shipping than Ipsy!
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Fun company, nice lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion. Sun tested this weekend. I do have to use a bit more than suggested. I may try another scent next time around. The sage way over powers the cucumber (for me)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been enjoying this product a lot. My face is usually dry after I shower or wash my face then tends to get oily throughout the day. Since I’ve been using this product I haven’t seen any oil on my face! Have only been using for a few days but I like it a lot. Goes on fairly easy, smells nice, and seems to keep my face moisturized. Only bummer is it seems pretty expensive for a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: feels amazing and smells sooooo good
customer_reviews.text: I love this face cream. I bought the cucumber sage and just put it on. It feels refreshing and you can feel it cooling your skin way after you apply it. It smells wonderful; nothing like starting your day with something that smells fresh and clean. I always use organic products and some of them just have no smell or even a musty smell. I love it. Glad I took the chance and ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recommend highly enough for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have wildly sensitive skin, so when I find a moisturizer I like, I stick with it. It smells so fresh, but it’s not overpowering. It doesn’t take much to make my skin feel hydrated. I definitely recommend this if you’re like me and even things made for sensitive skin break you out. The spf is pretty low, so don’t count on it as your only form of sun protection if you’ll be outside.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Liked the travel size better
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t make your face feel oily, helps with redness. Don’t love the bottle design, makes it difficult to shake and product will come out watery sometimes. The travel size I first tried this product with was thicker, which is why I liked it. Not sure if the bottle design is just the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle G.

customer_reviews.title: Found my holy grail moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is AMAZING! My skin is very picky about facial moisturizers but this one takes the cake. It smells, feels, and looks amazing. It’s not greasy at all, and the green cancels out any redness. The packing was adorable, it came wrapped in brown paper with “Jivi” on it and a hand signed card with the batch number, expiration, and a card saying my purchase donated a meal to a food bank. It was completely unexpected but made it all the more amazing. I’ve definitely found my holy grail moisturizer
customer_reviews.author: amber trip

customer_reviews.title: Not for moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Did not moisturize well. Skin felt dry within an hour or two of putting it on. There are better ways to moisturize. Did not irritate sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: the green tint is amazing at helping with redness and the scent is there ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been more impressed with something I received in a subscription box, than I have been with this moisturizer! It’s thick but absorbs quickly, the green tint is amazing at helping with redness and the scent is there but fades quickly. This this something I’ll continue to purchase and like more than any moisturizer (some quite expensive) I’ve bought or received in a box.
customer_reviews.author: daniii

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this lotion every day ever since I first discovered it via a sample in my ipsy bag. I love the smell and texture, and how the green tint compensates for redness. The size is handy for travel but I wish there were a larger, pump version available.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: The best moisturizer EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff!! I previously got it from an Ipsy bag anddd I fell instantly in love with it! It moisturizes so much better than many other products I’ve used over the years. Hands down, it is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Ginngersnap

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It moisturizes but doesn't leave my face greasy. My face gets pretty red and this seems to help. I've been getting lots of compliments on my skin since I started using it. Hasn't made me break out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the green color or lavender scent sway you, very good moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I was really thrown off by the color the first time I used it, it is green. Then I was really thrown off by the lavender smell. Very strong but dissipates quickly. Which I'm glad because I hate lavender scent, and don't know how I missed that when I ordered it. The moisturizer is thick but rubs in good, it doesn't leave a residue. I have sensitive and acne prone oily skin, but this works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Womack

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for only a week but have been very happy thus far. It is a great moisturizer but I bought it mainly for sun protection. It goes on great without making my acne prone, oily skin a greasy mess and without causing the weird texture that "matte" sunscreen often causes me. The only "problem" I had with it was the different smell. It was a bit off-putting to me at first but I got over it rather quickly. Great sunscreen over all, love it.
customer_reviews.author: LillyVee

customer_reviews.title: Especially nice for hiding redness
customer_reviews.text: It dries/absorbs very quickly so I mix with a bit of another face cream so I have more time to spread. It’s green, which (I assume) helps hide redness, but there is no green tint on my skin even when I have no redness. Has a nice clean smell.
customer_reviews.author: Cielo

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this moisturizer for the last year and a half and was happy to find it on amazon. It has a great natural scent and works great on my sensitive skin. I have many Jivi products and haven't found one I didn't like/love.
customer_reviews.author: SF City Girl

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely keep buying this one.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I think the protection is great and it goes on nice. Not oily and it doesn't cause me to break out like some other ones I've used. Goes on easy and lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but overpowering smell
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely helps with keeping my skin moisturized, as it tends to be on the dry side with other products. My only qualm is the overpowering scent. So I'm gonna stick to the cucumber sage one.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this as soon as it arrived. Before buying I read all the reviews and searched through other similar products but this is the winner. The smell is amazing and very fresh. The moisturize is light and refreshing and feels very good on the skin. The ingredients are all natural and organic. I love this and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It takes all my black heads out. If you have acne prone skin , this is something you can use.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good face moisturizer but I don't love the smell. Smells like green tea to me. It also feels a little waxy if I get sweaty soon after applying it. Moisturizer is pretty good but probably won't rebuy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S. Majewski

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best moisturizer I have ever used. Will most definitely be trying more products by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but weirdly thick
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and not creamy or smooth for application. A very odd consistency for a face cream. Smells good.
customer_reviews.author: whostheboz

customer_reviews.title: Ok job
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like how thick this was or that it was green but it did an ok job of moisturizing and sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I received a trial size of this in my Ipsy bag and fell in love!!!! I have the worlds most sensitive skin lol and this moisturizer left me moisturizer without the drying, peeling, itching and greasy. It instantly makes me glow, evening my skin tone plus it smells great!! Don’t be fooled by the size they come, you do not need a lot! The 0.5 oz trial size lasted me atleast 2 weeks. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Awful and broke my face out
customer_reviews.text: I got a little bottle of this in my Ipsy bag and used it for a little and loved it! I ordered it off here and it is not the same! Broke my face out and gave me a terrible rash, also the texture of this one of a lot different. I’m very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: katey

customer_reviews.title: Great natural Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the moisturizer I've been looking everywhere for years to find. I have combination skin, meaning it gets oily but I still ned moisture. This is all natural, stays matte and leaves my skin feeling soft while reducing the redness of my skin. I went without makeup for the first time in months after using this product for just 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: sarah stephens

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Honestly works really well, I’m just highly disappointed in the scent and I can’t really use it. I got the cucumber sage, and to me it smells like dill pickle. It’s hard to wanna put it on my face, even though it does work really well. I just cannot deal with the smell unfortunately. My bf thinks differently, but it’s pretty potent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Feels so natural and soothing
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer, it feels so natural and soothes the skin. It smells so good and feels like a treat to the skin. It does not break out my skin. The only little issue I have is that it needs to be have a bit more oil content in it. But I mix it with some organic almond oil before applying and it works great then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this for about a week but it's been good so far. My skin feels soft after and I like the lavender scent. I like how the SPF is natural. The packaging and marketing for this company is also awesome! I like to support companies that give back to the community.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Bockman

customer_reviews.title: My fave moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in Ipsy and loved it! It’s a great product and makes my skin feel healthy and smooth. I was really impressed with the witty comments on the label, but more so with the natural ingredients used. Bought some for my mom too and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Hated this product. Didn’t like the smell or feel. It goes on thick and caky, takes forever to blend into skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnettexoxo

customer_reviews.title: Amazeballs
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazeballs. My skin drinks it up and it smells great. It dries to a nice matte finish. I feel good knowing that it uses all natural ingredients. And they even donated a meal when I bought it! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: It definitely keeps the face soft, but I can't stand the smell. I am probably just not a big fan of sage scent. Made it hard to put it on
customer_reviews.author: mandy cook

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizer also provides amazing sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes well. Wonderful that it is all natural. (Not crazy about the smell on my face, but I've gotten used to it.) BEST PART: as a sunscreen it is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually pretty sensitive about smells but the smell in this is pretty light and doesn’t bother me at all. I loved the packaging and funny sayings. I’d buy it again just for that.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Good company!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I definitely love that they donate to my local food bank with every purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this as I am trying to more environmentally aware and for the first few days it really did hydrate my skin. However, after a few days it began to dry my skin severely. I'm disappointed in how this works over time. If you have sensitive skin, DO NOT GET THIS.
customer_reviews.author: quinn pedrick

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to sunscreen and this moisturizer doesnt make me break out!!! Love the smell and doesnt take too long to dry. Best part I dont feel greasy afterwards. 100% my favorite moisturizer
customer_reviews.author: Up In the Air

customer_reviews.title: Simple, clean and WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin- oily but also so dry, acne prone, redness. Lucky me. I got a sample of this in a Ipsy bag and it’s the only product I’ve ever ordered a full size of before the sample was even done. Simple ingredients that smell nice, absorbs very quickly and has helped to even the texture and tone of my skin. It’s now a staple in my skincare routine
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

product_meta.title: Face Moisturizer with SPF 12 Sun Protection (Lavender) | Reduces Redness & Prevents Sun Damage | 100% Natural with Organic Ingredients | Made for Sensitive & Oily Skin | 1.7 fl. oz.
product_meta.description: Scent:LavenderScent Name: Lavender Jivi started with a problem. Most of the skin care around us is full of crap: petrochemicals, synthetics, and active ingredients extracted and isolated from their plants. We were constantly turning to the back of supposedly natural products to find ingredients that were clearly produced in a lab, not in nature. Or we’d look online and find companies highlighting the few natural ingredients they use, while hiding or not listing the remaining unnatural ingredients (not a good sign). And the products that were natural were too expensive for us to use daily. So, we started Jivi to create a truly natural and affordable skin care option with ingredients we're happy to show off. All of our products are made by us, in the USA, out of 100% natural ingredients. They are both highly effective and safe enough to eat. Yep, you read that right. Skin is the largest organ of our bodies, and a lot of what we put on it gets absorbed into our bloodstream. So we decided that if we can’t eat it, we shouldn’t feed it to our skin. That means no chemicals, no parabens, and nothing synthetic. We’re rethinking skin care: from how we source our ingredients and formulate our products to how we bottle them (to avoid harsh preservatives) and get them to your doorstep. We are always looking for ways to create options for better health. We recognize that skin care is a luxury, and that there are people around us who are more concerned with what they can put in their bodies than on them. In almost every community across our country, people we interact with on a daily basis, co-workers and classmates, may be forced to make difficult choices: do I eat or pay rent? do I feed my family or get my insulin? As members of those communities, we want to be part of the solution. We partner with food banks across the country so that for every bottle you buy, we donate a meal, where you live, to a person in need. That way you get great skin and get to help improve the lives of people around you.
feature_bullets: LIGHT, NON-GREASY HYDRATION - Moisturize naturally with non-comedogenic shea butter and cucumber peel for all day hydration
SPF 12 MINERAL SUNSCREEN - Protect your face from the sun, without chemicals, with 5% non-nano zinc oxide and micro algae. Safe for coral reefs and for you.
PRIMED FOR MAKEUP – The matte finish primes your face to easily spread makeup that lasts all day. Plus, a light green tint combats redness so you’re good to go without makeup too!
EVERY BOTTLE DONATES A MEAL - For every bottle you buy, we donate a meal to Feeding America to help alleviate hunger in your community and beyond
MADE IN THE USA – We make our moisturizer in small batches in North Carolina out of 100% natural ingredients, so you get a high quality product you can trust

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
